item.title: rktpi
item.description: What it is A platform for web apps running on YOUR Pi, with YOUR Data, accessible from YOUR phone. Features A guard computer for your phone A translator of documents An internet filtered of garbage A path out of the cloud Keep your own email, back it up ez The Questions Rocket Pi is an attempt to answer the following questions: how can we get developers to build web apps which allow you to keep your data how can i legally show you your FB feed without all the garbage you didn’t ever ask for why can’t we have just email we can trust (spoiler: we can) many people want out of the cloud, but do not know how
